prompt:
A boldly alluring Korean woman in her 20s in a laundromat, framed waist-up to mid-thigh.
Pose: leaning against a machine, hips angled, one hand folding a sweater close to her body.
Expression: half-lidded eyes, parted lips, no smile, intimate tension.
Outfit: ribbed knit tank + linen shirt open, matte textures.
Lighting: cool fluorescent + window spill mixed, smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 50mm f/1.8 handheld documentary candid. Film: Portra 400.
